section.name: Maven StatCvs Plugin
section.p: A plugin to generate statistics about CVS usage using StatCvs-XML. This page and plugin is maintained by the authors of StatCvs-XML. It superseeds the StatCvs plugin formerly shipped with maven.

section.name: Customization
section.p: The output of StatCvs-XML, i.e. the generated documents and the format of the reports, is highly customizable. StatCvs-XML looks for a file called statcvs.xml in the current directory (the directory Maven was started from) to read project settings.
Please see the StatCvs-XML manual for configuration options. The properties page describes customization settings for the plugin.

subsection.name: Release
subsection.p: There are three alternative ways to install the plugin. Choose one.

ul.li:
The easiest way to install the StatCvs maven plugin is through maven:
maven plugin:download -DartifactId=maven-statcvs-plugin -DgroupId=statcvs -Dversion=2.5

Alternatively you can download the plugin manually, unpack the jar archive and install the plugin into your Maven repository:
jar xvf maven-statcvs-plugin-2.5.jar maven plugin:install

Or add a dependency in your project.xml:
<dependency> <groupId>statcvs</groupId> <artifactId>maven-statcvs-plugin</artifactId> <version>2.5</version> <type>plugin</type> </dependency>

subsection.name: Latest from CVS
subsection.p: It is easy stay to stay on the cutting edge of the StatCvs-XML development. You need to follow these steps:

ol.li: Check out StatCvs-XML from cvs cvs -z3 -d:pserver:anonymous@cvs.statcvs-xml.berlios.de:/cvsroot/statcvs-xml co statcvs-xml2
Update the StatCvs-XML jar in your Maven repository cd statcvs-xml2 maven jar:install
Check out the StatCvs Maven plugin from cvs cvs -z3 -d:pserver:anonymous@cvs.statcvs-xml.berlios.de:/cvsroot/statcvs-xml co statcvs-xml-maven
Update the StatCvs plugin in your Maven repository cd statcvs-xml-maven maven plugin:install

subsection.p: That's it! Now run maven statcvs xdoc on your project and enjoy the latest of the StatCvs-XML development.
